lines.gurmukhi: jb qy prm gur crn srin Awey crn srin ilv skl sMswr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jab Tay Param Gur Charan Sarani Aaay , Charan Sarani Liv Sakal Sansaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Since the time a human being takes the refuge in the holy feet of the True Guru, the people of the world then start contemplating in the refuge of his feet.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml mkrMd crnwmiRq kY cwhq crn ryn skl Akwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Makarand Charanaamrit Kai , Chaahat Charan Rayn Sakal Akaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By taking the foot-wash of the True Guru while staying in His refuge, the entire mankind desires to be blessed by his holy feet.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml suK sMpt shj Gir inhcl miq prmwrQ bIcwr hY
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Soukh Sanpat Sahaj Ghari , Nihachal Mati Paramaarad Beechaar Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: By living in the peaceful refuge of the lotus-like feet of the True Guru, one gets absorbed in a state of equipoise. Because of higher spiritual wisdom, they become stable of mind and consciousness.

lines.gurmukhi: crn kml gur mihmw AgwiD boiD nyiq nyiq nmo nmo kY nmskwr hY ]217]
lines.transliteration_english: Charan Kamal Gur Mahimaa Agaadhi Bodhi , Nayti Nayti Namo Namo Kai Namasakaar Hai ?217?

Shabad OS B.translation: The glory of the lotus-like feet of the True Guru is beyond comprehension, It is limitless, infinite. He is worthy of salutation again and again. (217)
